about_the_game:
An erotic Visual Novel featuring HD graphics and realistic-looking characters.
Embark on Tony’s Sex Adventure as he rediscovers life as a single man.
Episode 4 brings him to a gay-only Resort in the Caribbean where all guests are free to explore their sexual desires without limitations. Lounging by the pool bar, Tony is approached by a good-looking exhibitionist who challenges him to a steamy lovemaking session outside.
Will Tony rise to the guy’s challenge?

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Tony and embark on his wild Sex Adventure as he rediscovers life as a single guy.

EPISODE 4
Following a friend's tip, Tony jets off to a renowned gay-only Resort in the Caribbean.
Here, nudity is not just welcomed but encouraged, and a careful vetting system makes sure that all guests are free to explore their sexual boundaries and desires in a private and safe environment.
Kickstarting his vacation with a cold beer at the pool bar, Tony is approached by a good-looking exhibitionist sporting an impressive package.
True to his daring name, Maverick challenges Tony to a steamy lovemaking session by the pool, exposed to any wanderer’s eye.

Will Tony rise to Maverick’s challenge? Will he set aside his inhibitions to enjoy himself?
Follow his Sex Adventure and find out!

FEATURES

- HD renders
- Image gallery

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains gay sex scenes.

name: Gay Sex Adventures - Episode 4

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
